name: NSValue
desc: A simple container for a single C or Objective-C data item.

items.name: init(bytes: UnsafeRawPointer, objCType: UnsafePointer<CChar>)
items.desc: Initializes a value object to contain the specified value, interpreted with the specified Objective-C type.

items.name: init(UnsafeRawPointer, withObjCType: UnsafePointer<CChar>)
items.desc: Creates a value object containing the specified value, interpreted with the specified Objective-C type.

items.name: var objCType: UnsafePointer<CChar>
items.desc: A C string containing the Objective-C type of the data contained in the value object.

items.name: init(pointer: UnsafeRawPointer?)
items.desc: Creates a value object containing the specified pointer.

items.name: init(nonretainedObject: Any?)
items.desc: Creates a value object containing the specified object.

items.name: var pointerValue: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: Returns the value as an untyped pointer.

items.name: var nonretainedObjectValue: Any?
items.desc: The value as a non-retained pointer to an object.

items.name: init(range: NSRange)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified Foundation range structure.

items.name: var rangeValue: NSRange
items.desc: The Foundation range structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(point: NSPoint)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified Foundation point structure.

items.name: init(size: NSSize)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified Foundation size structure.

items.name: init(rect: NSRect)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified Foundation rectangle structure.

items.name: var pointValue: NSPoint
items.desc: The Foundation point structure representation of the value.

items.name: var sizeValue: NSSize
items.desc: The Foundation size structure representation of the value.

items.name: var rectValue: NSRect
items.desc: The Foundation rectangle structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(cgPoint: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreGraphics point structure.

items.name: init(cgVector: CGVector)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreGraphics vector structure.

items.name: init(cgSize: CGSize)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreGraphics size structure.

items.name: init(cgRect: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreGraphics rectangle structure.

items.name: init(cgAffineTransform: CGAffineTransform)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreGraphics affine transform structure.

items.name: var cgPointValue: CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the CoreGraphics point structure representation of the value.

items.name: var cgVectorValue: CGVector
items.desc: Returns the CoreGraphics vector structure representation of the value.

items.name: var cgSizeValue: CGSize
items.desc: Returns the CoreGraphics size structure representation of the value.

items.name: var cgRectValue: CGRect
items.desc: Returns the CoreGraphics rectangle structure representation of the value.

items.name: var cgAffineTransformValue: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: Returns the CoreGraphics affine transform representation of the value.

items.name: init(uiEdgeInsets: UIEdgeInsets)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified UIKit edge insets structure.

items.name: init(uiOffset: UIOffset)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified UIKit offset structure.

items.name: var uiEdgeInsetsValue: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: Returns the UIKit edge insets structure representation of the value.

items.name: var uiOffsetValue: UIOffset
items.desc: Returns the UIKit offset structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(caTransform3D: CATransform3D)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreAnimation transform structure.

items.name: var caTransform3DValue: CATransform3D
items.desc: The CoreAnimation transform structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(time: CMTime)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreMedia time structure.

items.name: init(timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreMedia time range structure.

items.name: init(timeMapping: CMTimeMapping)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreMedia time mapping structure.

items.name: var timeValue: CMTime
items.desc: The CoreMedia time structure representation of the value.

items.name: var timeRangeValue: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The CoreMedia time range structure representation of the value.

items.name: var timeMappingValue: CMTimeMapping
items.desc: The CoreMedia time mapping structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(mkCoordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified CoreLocation geographic coordinate structure.

items.name: init(mkCoordinateSpan: MKCoordinateSpan)
items.desc: Creates a new value object containing the specified MapKit coordinate span structure.

items.name: var mkCoordinateValue: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The CoreLocation geographic coordinate structure representation of the value.

items.name: var mkCoordinateSpanValue: MKCoordinateSpan
items.desc: The MapKit coordinate span structure representation of the value.

items.name: init(scnVector3: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a value object that contains the specified three-element SceneKit vector.

items.name: init(scnVector4: SCNVector4)
items.desc: Creates a value object that contains the specified four-element SceneKit vector.

items.name: init(scnMatrix4: SCNMatrix4)
items.desc: Creates a value object that contains the specified SceneKit 4 x 4 matrix.

items.name: var scnVector3Value: SCNVector3
items.desc: The three-element Scene Kit vector representation of the value.

items.name: var scnVector4Value: SCNVector4
items.desc: The four-element Scene Kit vector representation of the value.

items.name: var scnMatrix4Value: SCNMatrix4
items.desc: The Scene Kit 4 x 4 matrix representation of the value.

items.name: func isEqual(to: NSValue) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the value object and another value object are equal.
